description:
Number 1 Life Lesson:⁣
⁣
Don’t take anything personally. ⁣
⁣
I have learned as a mama, friend, wife, entrepreneur, nurse....just don’t. ⁣
⁣
People go through seasons⁣
⁣
People are healing their own trauma ⁣
⁣
People might be having a bad day ⁣
⁣
People might feel overwhelmed⁣
⁣
People may be projecting ⁣
⁣
People might be fighting a battle I can’t see.⁣
⁣
Bottom line: when you realize it’s not personal, you can still love that person, have compassion for them, and if needed, have a healthy boundary up. ⁣
⁣
Just a sweet reminder for your Monday YES you are enough and no one else gets to determine or define your worth, your value, and what you bring to the table 🤜🏻⁣
⁣
Happy Monday friends!
.
.
.
#mondaymotivation 
#highvibetribe 
#wildandfreemama 
#intentionalmotherhood 
#intentionallife 
#youcanhealyourlife
